definition: peptide chain (chain of amino acids making up protein)
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: A computer program for DNA and polypeptide sequence analysis was made.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种DNA和多肽链序列分析的软件系统。

sentences.english: Proteins are made up of one or more polypeptides. See peptide; denaturation; conjugated protein.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白质是由一条或多条多肽链组成。

sentences.english: Are the residues contiguous in the primary sequence of the polypeptide chain?
sentences.chinese: 这些残基在多肽链的一级结构上是连续的吗？

sentences.english: These amino acids are polymerized to form the growing polypeptide chain.
sentences.chinese: 这些氨基酸聚合在一起形成了伸长的多肽链。

sentences.english: Amino acids link together to form chains called peptides.
sentences.chinese: 氨基酸连接在一起，形成所谓的肽链。

sentences.english: This spatial configuration of the polypeptide chain is the secondary structure.
sentences.chinese: 肽链的这个空间构象就是二级结构。

sentences.english: Conclusion It is concluded that carboxylate oxygen and chromium were bonding with coordinated bond.
sentences.chinese: 结论蛋白质肽链上的羰基氧与铬形成配位键。

sentences.english: Primary structure --- The amino acid sequence of a polypeptide.
Quality control over protein structure and function depends on the presence of molecular chaperones and proteases, which prevent aggregation.
sentences.chinese: 分子伴侣和蛋白酶可有效地调控多肽链的正确折叠。

sentences.english: Proteins are made up of one or more polypeptides.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白质是由一条或多条多肽链组成。

sentences.english: As reaction time was prolonged, the lengths of the peptides were increased.
sentences.chinese: 随着反应时间的延长，所形成的肽链的长度也会增加。

definition: peptide bond CO-NH/bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical
single chain/refers to RNA as opposed to the double helix DNA
base pairing (e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA)/base pair
